name: Motor Quest
description:
Description

Agent Smith has framed you for a crime that you did not commit and exiled you from the agency.  He must pay for his crimes.  Luckily you are equipped with powerful motorcycle that has a serious arsenal of weaponry.  Shoot homing rockets, launch grenades, and rain fire down on enemies with advanced missiles.  Defeat Smith and save the day in this fast-paced, high-intensity motorcycle combat adventure.

Credits Lucky Clover Games

Glen Haggin
Darian Fortner
Scott Hirsch
Patrick Sherry
Maddy Ericksen

Special Thanks

Austin Yarger (trailer voice cameo)
